verses.roman:
'āmi likhi',--eha mithyā kari anumāna
āmāra śarīra kāṣṭha-putalī-samāna

synonyms: āmi likhi—I write; eha mithyā—this is false; kari anumāna—I can infer; āmāra śarīra—my body; kāṣṭha-putalī-samāna—is exactly like a wooden doll.
translation: I infer that "I have written" is a false understanding, for my body is like a wooden doll.
